definition[0]: done very quickly or too quickly, because there was not enough time
example[0]: We did have a meeting, but it was a bit rushed.
definition[1]: if you are rushed, you are very busy because you have a lot of things to do quickly
example[1]: I’ll talk to you later – I’m a bit rushed at the moment.
example[2]: I’ve been rushed off my feet (=extremely busy) all day.
